name: Kurinur Web Technologies
overview:
Kurinur is a dynamic workshop where individual experts from many sectors, empowering to fetch the goal of a 24/7 web service oriented company. We work hard to earn client’s satisfaction by all means.

We work with clients worldwide to create memorable brands and powerful websites. We excel at design, social media, online marketing, E-Commerce solutions and web hosting. Our boundless creativity, entrepreneurial spirit, competitive nature and personal dedication to our clients will bring your work to the optimum level. We want your new website to shine and set you far and above those of your competitors.

Kurinur is a Privately Limited company which is sited at the heart of the country capital, 46,Kazi Nazrul islam Avenue, Dhaka. Here we have a peaceful environment & easy communication system with secured data facility.

offices.address1: Ahmed Manssion, 46 Kazi Nazrul Islam Avenue (5th Floor),
